thread.title: Simply the Best!
thread.title_full: Simply the Best! - Review of Hotel 41, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: briodowd11
title: Simply the Best!
text:
Everything from check in to checkout was amazing. Malcolm and his team (especially Andrew and Lauren) made sure that i felt like family and never wanted for anything... a rose on international women's day was a nice touch :) Bottom line is that if you want to be spoiled... stay here!
Room Tip: if you can afford the executive suite - DO IT! Quiet with space and amazing showers...yes, plural! See more room tips
